channel.title: Provenance on Michael E. Nelson

item.title: The Glambu-Launch Post
item.description: Question: What is the sum of the galleries, libraries, archives, and museums industry category‘s acronym (GLAM) and the archaic word ambulator (Noun, “One that walks about” - Lewis & Short, 1879)? Answer: Glambulator, the name of my CHI project. Glambulator has launched, and it’s available at glambulator.matrix.msu.edu/. Entity Graph Tab Glambulator is about exploring the CIDOC Conceptual Reference Model (CIDOC-CRM) and phenomena that have been annotated by it.
